entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
